thread.title: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119”
thread.title_full: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119”

author: eclipse01
title: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119”
text: RIIZE Tops Melon Hot 100 And iTunes Charts Around The World With “Love 119” RIIZE’s latest comeback is off to a promising start! On January 5 at 6 p.m KST, RIIZE made their highly-anticipated return with their new single “ [Love 119](https://www.soompi.com/article/1634508wpp/watch-riize-gears-up-for-new-single-love-119-with-mv-teaser).” Shortly after its release, “Love 119” soared to the top of various domestic realtime charts in Korea, including Melon’s Hot 100 (for songs released within the last 30 days), Bugs, and Vibe. “Love 119” also reached No. 1 on Line Music’s realtime Top 100 chart in Japan, as well as iTunes charts in various countries around the world. By 10 a.m. KST on January 6, “Love 119” had already hit No. 1 on iTunes Top Songs charts in at least nine different regions including Thailand, Peru, Indonesia, Chile, Vietnam, Colombia, Malaysia, Mongolia, and the Philippines. The single also entered the top 10 in 16 different regions including Japan, Brazil, Norway, Taiwan, Hungary, Singapore, and Uzbekistan. In addition to RIIZE’s cinematic music video for “Love 119” (which you can check out [here](https://www.soompi.com/article/1634508wpp/watch-riize-gears-up-for-new-single-love-119-with-mv-teaser)), the group will be releasing a performance video for the song on January 6 at 6 p.m. KST on their official YouTube channel. Congratulations to RIIZE! Watch RIIZE perform at the [2023 MBC Music Festival](https://www.viki.com/tv/40335c-2023-mbc-music-festival?utm_source=soompi&utm_source=soompi&utm_medium=soompi_news&utm_campaign=soompi_link&utm_content=riize-tops-melon-hot-100-and-itunes-charts-around-the-world-with-love-119&utm_content_id=1635509wpp&utm_medium=soompi_news&utm_campaign=soompi_link&utm_content=riize-tops-melon-hot-100-and-itunes-charts-around-the-world-with-love-119&utm_content_id=1635509wpp) with subtitles on Viki below: Source ( [1](https://entertain.naver.com/read?oid=109&aid=0004994257))
